Art of the Start

One of the better books I have read in recent months is Guy Kawasaki’s The Art of the Start. Although the book is generally about start ups, there is a ton of very sound and practical advice.

I still recommend picking up a copy of the book, but if you are short on time, you can now watch Kawasaki do a presentation on many of the topics from the book.

Posted on Jul 07, 2006 and tagged as books, business
